website_summaries.verdict: The Sony MDR-EX36V Stereo Headphones are a good budget-friendly option for anyone who wants to upgrade from the earbuds that come packaged with MP3 players.
pros: The Sony MDR-EX36V headphones are an obvious step up from stock buds in both comfort and sound quality, and the price is a bargain
The headphones come with handy accessories like a cable wrap, travel pouch, and inline volume control
They offer deep bass and reasonable sound isolation
cons: The Sony MDR-EX36V headphones suffer from a cheap, plastic design

customer_reviews.title: Seriously 'Sony' Really Means Something Here.
customer_reviews.text: In all candor I bought these headphones initially because I like blue and I like Sony and I wanted a $20 pair of headphones. What I stumbled on was a high quality piece of audio gear that gives my $100+ Klipsch ear buds a run for their money and depending on how you like to listen to music arguably outperform my fancy noise cancelling Bose. I have been burned in the past by relying on the Sony brand for low end products, but this time I picked a real winner.
customer_reviews.author: Insider Rebel

customer_reviews.title: Have 4, 1 died after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Although I have had one set of these fail, I still feel that for the cost they are excellent. I purchased my first set about 3 years ago and those are still going strong. My most recent purchase just failed. I would give these Sony earbuds 5/5 stars, but now, with the failure, it's 4/5. Based on the reviews of others, I would have to say your mileage could vary, but clearly most people have good luck with them. I just ordered another Sony MDREC36V/BLU replacement for the failed unit.
customer_reviews.author: Brent in Bismarck

customer_reviews.title: Lasts ~2 years
customer_reviews.text: This pair was a replacement for the same pair I bought ~ 2 years ago. I love these earphones and I abuse them (throw them in the bottom of my purse or gym bag)... so it's really surprising to me that they lasted that long. A few weeks ago, the left earbud stopped working, so I bought this pair to replace them. Sound quality is decent for the price, but I am not picky about that. I also like that they come with 3 different size ear pieces because I have small ears and the Apple earbuds that came with my iPhone hurt my ears.
customer_reviews.author: LindsayN

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones around
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through a on of headphones in our household. These Sony MDREX36V/BLU EX's have been the best and have lasted the longest. The sounds quality is great. They really cancel out all other background noise. The cord is plenty long enough and the colors are great. I would recommend these to anyone who is interested in a great listening experience.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE

customer_reviews.title: these are the best headphones ever made on this planet for under $100
customer_reviews.text: For earbuds, these are the best headphones ever made on this planet for under $100. They stay in, have a variety of ear tip sizes, and sound fantastic with deep, rich bass and crystal clear highs. Uncanny, actually, how good they work. The updated model is harder to insert but have similar sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: RB601

customer_reviews.title: breaks in few months
customer_reviews.text: ok s o I used it for few months and one side stopped working. the sound quality is good but its not reliable. after another few months both sides stopped working. there was no wear and tear still it didn't work. I would buy this instead.  I am not promoting the product but these are just so good that I think people would benefit from it like I did.
customer_reviews.author: conscious soul

customer_reviews.title: Extremely bright - almost too much
customer_reviews.text: If you like almost ear splitting highs, you'll like these buds. On the other hand, it's easy to cringe every time a cymbal is hit. Almost returned them and decided to try to break them in with loud bass-heavy music, and that actually seemed to help. They're okay to listen to for short periods, but due to the brittle high end, listener fatigue sets in. Bass response seems adequate. Can't really judge the quality of the mids ... they're overpowered by the highs. Decent value for under $20.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Overall, ok sound.
customer_reviews.text: I had these for like 2 years until one of the pieces died. Don't expect a lot of power coming out from this, but from the price, it's not expected. nice length of the cable, and it has 3 different sizes for the ear-cups so it fits all ears I bought these as an emergency, later on when I had the money I bought me the Sennheiser 280 Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Handsome Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these I have ordered. I mostly listen to podcasts & audiobooks, rarely music, so I may not be the best judge when it comes to music sound reproduction. But I would know if they sounded crappy and they don't. I like these b/c they have in-line volume control. Much more convenient than trying to locate those controls on my phone. The main reason I buy these is because the jack coming out of the device is at a right angle. The one downside is the rubber at the jack end does crack and split eventually. But only after a few years of consistent use so it doesn't keep me from buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 14 months poor design
customer_reviews.text: The ear buds sound fine but after about 14 months of light use one ear bud lost its sound. If I wiggle the wire around the sound comes back until I let go of the wire. I am an engineer and it looks to me that there is no strain protection on the wires going into the earbuds and this why they develop connection problems.
customer_reviews.author: WPL

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, Durable and a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I go through a fair number of headphones, I tend to be rough on them and use them for everything, including intense workouts (average lifespan in less than 4 months). And these suckers have taken the punishment that I have meted out and stood up. Really, these are the best combination of cost and durability that I have found in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel O. Buchholz

customer_reviews.title: They were good while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: They were good while they lasted. One of the earbuds failed after about a year and I did not abuse these. I had two other pairs with inline controls that failed within a few months of owning them as well. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: The comfort and outside noise sound deadening are great. There are different ear size fittings that come with these buds making the fit a bit more customized. The sound is good but really depends on the source. They seemed pricey at first but the fit alone blows the other buds I have had away. No more foam or unforgiving plastic ever again!
customer_reviews.author: J. Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Broke Today
customer_reviews.text: Decent earbuds for the price. Purchased March 3rd, right ear begin to fade in and out Oct 31, Nov 1st right ear was done. Even on the higher end of previous Sony headphones/earphone/earbuds that I've owned this has happened in either ear and I take relatively good care of my electronics both in use and not. I'm going to try another company.
customer_reviews.author: Cmon Collapse

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why. Maybe they just fit me right, but these give clear sound while blocking other noises out while I'm wearing them. I'm not an audiophile, or a person who can shell out tons of money for earphones or earbuds. For the money, these rock!
customer_reviews.author: LynneAH

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sound through the earbuds are not as loud as I would like, but they are MUCH more comfortable than the ones that originally came with the iPod. They also screen out external noise pretty well, so be careful if you are using them in situations where you might need to pay attention to your surroundings!
customer_reviews.author: wildcoho

customer_reviews.title: Flawed plug design leads to short product life.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality headphones but the audio plug tends to disintegrate rapidly. For the price I would expect these to last longer. Served me well while they lasted but will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Atomic Guru

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality. I have a different and older sony that are still working
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my iphone. I must say, the sound quality is a huge improvement over Apple's headphones, even if it's a little tinny at the high end (thats not to say it lacks bass). They are very comfortable. The cord is a good length but it's easy to tangle.
customer_reviews.author: J Vitz

customer_reviews.title: Dead On Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Upon receipt the packaging appeared to be fine, there was no obvious damage. However upon plugging in the headphones and the right earbud had no audio. I previously had a similar pair of Sony headphones that eventually had a broken earbud but this is simply terrible quality and bad luck.
customer_reviews.author: nault3

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and fragile
customer_reviews.text: Sound great but don't hold up. Been through 3 pair now. Bluetooth is the way to go now a days.
customer_reviews.author: William Records

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice volume control, but lack durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Jan 2010 and everything works fine as expected until now one of the earphones died and I have been keeping the earphones very well with no scratch at all but some how it just died and obviously I have two ears and its weird to just hear one side music so now I have to buy a new one again...
customer_reviews.author: byron

customer_reviews.title: Good product for those with small ear canals
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are used with a motorcycle helmet on. Previous earbuds were ripped out of my ear when I took the helmet off and sometimes became loose when I put it on. Not with these earbuds. They fit a small ear so well that putting on and taking off the helmet does not loosen them. They sound better than most because of the good fit. They are definitely a good buy if you have a small ear canal.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ronald Mcginnis Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I lost my first pair. Which I had over a year.... I use the headphone every other day and they are working! Very reliable compared to the other brands on the market. Had jbuds and some others before which wouldlast 2 months. These have lasted me over a year. No issues. Sound quality is nothing special. They have a very comfortable fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Egor Astakhov

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sound isolating
customer_reviews.text: Used the earphones on a long airplane trip, found them effective in blocking out unwanted sounds. Sound has nice range and decent bass.
customer_reviews.author: The Halls

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but poor fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the built in volume booster (helps a lot on the subway) but the buds do fall out of my ears from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Middlebrook

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These ear phones are amazing, the quality is great the sound is perfect and the build is sturdy, I highly recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: W. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Its not suitable for exercising as it keeps coming out of the ears while running. Otherwise not bad. Does not isolate the noise fully. Does the job well for 20$.
customer_reviews.author: hmk

customer_reviews.title: "Excellent..."
customer_reviews.text: I know that Sony makes good products... These earbuds are at the top of the list as far as sound... bass... comfortablilty. with volume control, you really get to drown out whoever & whatever the noise is...
customer_reviews.author: A. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: These buds are not compatible with a iPhone, iPad or iPod ! They took two weeks to get here . Test your products before you advertise them . You said they were compatible I say there junk, give me back my money !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I use the earbuds at night when I can't sleep and don't want to wake my husband. I needed them to be flexible and sturdy and this is what they are to me.
customer_reviews.author: KathyK

customer_reviews.title: sony blue earphone
customer_reviews.text: excellent fit. sound as good as it gets for the price. volume control is a nice touch. length of cables is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Frodo

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE BUDS have pair in the car, at work and the home i got 3 refurbished and they were excellent-
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I've listened to these buds and my other $15 V-Moda's and there is no comparison. The VM is 10 times better than the Sony's. The volume on the Sony has to be nearly twice the VM to hear the same song at the same level. Maybe I got a bad pair as I ordered these based on reviews and $10 less than retail. The order was through Compusa and I create an account as you need a RA number. There is NO record online of my order. What a hassle this is going to be!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt last
customer_reviews.text: These headphones dont last long. I have gone throught three pairs in the past two years. This most recent pair isnt quite broken yet but it does have some defects. The sound changes from high to low when I angle the headphones a certain way. Also the headphone imput wire cracked so the interior wires were exposed. I superglued it back together and it seemed to work. My last paid, one ear bud stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: robes

customer_reviews.title: Best "Buds" for your money!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones I have ever had. Great sound, great fit & the volume control is a wonderful plus! I use them at the office and I can't hear the background noise from other workers.
customer_reviews.author: SM-Tx, USA

customer_reviews.title: decent headphones
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good, but they dont last very long. I've had mine for about a month and a half, and they are already broken. If they lasted longer, they would be a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Gail M. Brecht

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: New to iPod and those earbuds were terrible always falling out and the sound was so so. Bought these Sony ear buds and was surprised and how well they fit and the sound quality is very good, nice tones. Excellent for the price. Would highly recommend for entry level and price concerned buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Mac55

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price. Easy to use and in-line volume control is a must have. Carry case is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: ASR

customer_reviews.title: tinny sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at circuit city today during their close-out sale. The sound is thin and tinny, no bass or depth to the sound. I'm no audiophile, but even I can tell these are awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sony MDREX36V/BLU EX Earbud Headphone (Blue) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard Packaging9mm EX Drivers --- Allows for a comfortable fit and a deep and full sounding bass performance all in a small package. In-Line Volume control --- Allows you to control your volume without having to take out your player from where you are carrying it. Cord adjuster --- Allows you to conviently control the length of the cord. Three sizes of ear buds --- You can pick the size that right for you for comfort and performance.
feature_bullets: 9Mm Driver Provides Comfort Fit and Deep Bass Sound
9mm EX provides comfort fit and deep bass sound

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars58 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
